meanings.sent1: The ancient Greeks believed in goddesses who controlled different aspects of life.
meanings.sent2: The goddesses in mythology were powerful beings worshipped by many.
meanings.sent3: The goddesses decided to have a picnic on Mount Olympus, but forgot to bring ambrosia.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and grace made her seem like a goddess among mortals.
meanings.sent5: The goddesses' beauty shone like the stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A woman of extraordinary beauty and charm.
meanings.sent1: She was the talk of the town, known as the goddesses of the ball.
meanings.sent2: The actress was considered one of the goddesses of Hollywood during that era.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone flocked around her like she was a goddesses of allure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, making her the goddesses of the evening.
meanings.sent5: In her elegant gown, she looked like a goddesses from a fairy tale.
